verses.verse: In the third <S%H7992><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gone forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, the same day <S%H3117><s%> came <S%H935><s%> they into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.

For they were departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rephidim <S%H7508><s%>, and were come <S%H935><s%> to the desert <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and had pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; and there Israel <S%H3478><s%> camped <S%H2583><s%> before the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto him out of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus shall you say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and tell <S%H5046><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

You have seen <S%H7200><s%> what I did <S%H6213><s%> unto the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and how I gave birth to <S%H5375><s%> you on eagles <S%H5404><s%>' wings <S%H3671><s%>, and brought you unto myself <S%H935><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H8085><s%>, if you will obey my voice <S%H6963><s%> indeed <S%H8085><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>, then you shall be a peculiar treasure <S%H5459><s%> unto me above all people <S%H5971><s%>: for all the earth is my <S%H776><s%>.

And you shall be unto me a kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of priests <S%H3548><s%>, and a holy <S%H6918><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>. These are the words <S%H1697><s%> which you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> before their faces <S%H6440><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded him <S%H6680><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, All that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> we will do <S%H6213><s%>. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, behold I come <S%H935><s%> unto you in a thick <S%H5645><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%>, that the people <S%H5971><s%> may hear <S%H8085><s%> when I speak <S%H1696><s%> with you and believe <S%H539><s%> you for ever <S%H5769><s%>. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them to day <S%H3117><s%> and to morrow <S%H4279><s%>, and let them wash <S%H3526><s%> their clothes <S%H8071><s%>,

And be ready <S%H3559><s%> against the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: for the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will come down <S%H3381><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.

And you shall set bounds <S%H1379><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Take care <S%H8104><s%> to yourselves <S%H5927><s%>, that you go not up into the mount <S%H2022><s%>, or touch <S%H5060><s%> the border <S%H7097><s%> of it <S%H5060><s%>: whoever touches the mount <S%H2022><s%> shall be surely <S%H4191><s%> put to death <S%H4191><s%>:

There shall not a hand <S%H3027><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> it <S%H5619><s%>, but he shall surely be stoned <S%H5619><s%>, or <S%H176><s%> shot <S%H3384><s%> through <S%H3384><s%>; whether it be animal <S%H929><s%> or <S%H518><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, it shall not live <S%H2421><s%>: when the trumpet <S%H3104><s%> sounds long <S%H4900><s%>, they shall come up <S%H5927><s%> to the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>; and they washed <S%H3526><s%> their clothes <S%H8071><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Be <S%H1961><s%> ready <S%H3559><s%> against the third <S%H7969><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: come <S%H5066><s%> not at your wives <S%H802><s%>.

And it came to pass on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, that there were thunders <S%H6963><s%> and lightnings <S%H1300><s%>, and a thick <S%H3515><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%> upon the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> loud <S%H2389><s%>; so that all the people <S%H5971><s%> that was in the camp <S%H4264><s%> trembled <S%H2729><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> out of the camp <S%H4264><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> with God <S%H430><s%>; and they stood <S%H3320><s%> at the lower <S%H8482><s%> part of the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> was altogether on a smoke <S%H6225><s%>, because <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> upon it in fire <S%H784><s%>: and the smoke <S%H6227><s%> there ascended <S%H5927><s%> as the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of a furnace <S%H3536><s%>, and the whole mount <S%H2022><s%> quaked <S%H2729><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>.

And when the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> sounded <S%H6963><s%> long <S%H1980><s%>, and grew louder <S%H2390><s%> and louder <S%H3966><s%>, Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%>, and God <S%H430><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him by a voice <S%H6963><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> upon mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%>: and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> up to <S%H413><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Go down <S%H3381><s%>, warn <S%H5749><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, lest they break through <S%H2040><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to gaze <S%H7200><s%>, and many <S%H7227><s%> of them perish <S%H5307><s%>.
And let the priests <S%H3548><s%> also <S%H5066><s%>, which come near to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, sanctify <S%H6942><s%> themselves <S%H3068><s%>, lest the Lord break forth upon them <S%H6555><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, The people <S%H5971><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> come up <S%H5927><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>: for you ordered <S%H5749><s%> us <S%H559><s%>, saying, Set bounds <S%H1379><s%> about the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and sanctify it <S%H6942><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Away, get you down <S%H3381><s%>, and you shall come up <S%H5927><s%>, you and Aaron <S%H175><s%> with you but let not the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> break through <S%H2040><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, lest he break forth upon them <S%H6555><s%>.
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, and spoke unto them <S%H559><s%>.
